channel.title: The Dyer Laboratory
channel.description: Research on the spatial distribution of population and landscape genetic variation.

item.title: DLabMatrix
item.dc:creator: Rodney Dyer
item.description: A swift library package for matrix algebra related to landscape and population genetic analyses.

item.title: DLabSpatial
item.dc:creator: Rodney Dyer
item.description: A swift library package for the analysis and display of spatial data for analytical software targeting iOS and MacOS platforms.

item.title: R::gstudio
item.dc:creator: Rodney Dyer
item.description: An R package for the analysis of population genetic data in the R computing environment.

item.title: R::popgraph
item.dc:creator: Rodney Dyer
item.description: An R package for the creation and analysis of population graph objects after Dyer & Nason (2004).

item.title: DLabGenetics
item.dc:creator: Rodney Dyer
item.description: A swift library package for collection, maintainence, manipulation, and analysis of genetic data.
